title: Cannot set width of canvas view to more then 1000

comments.author: michaldobrodenka
comments.body: Maximum canvas size is dependent on the os and graphic hw. I think it's between 4096x4096 to 16384x16384 pixels

comments.author: sarthak199526
comments.body: This mean it's not possible to create a horizontally scrollable long bar chart using skia-sharp canvas view since I might gonna need width so much greater then the above you suggest ?

comments.author: michaldobrodenka
comments.body:
Exactly. You should keep size of canvas smaller or not much bigger than size of screen.

We have Skiasharp drawn charts, they are scrollable and zoom able. But scroll is implemented within canvas. I listen for Move/Pan/Zoom event/gesture (I don't know how it's called in Xamarin Forms implementation, I use WPF, Xamarin.Android/iOS native), and redraw canvas accordingly.

Or another approcah, if you have something like scrollable items is to use some collection view (Vertical or Horizontal) with many items, each containing own canvas. This collection view can preferably use recycling technique, so only on screen visible canvases (+ small cache) are allocated in memory. Skiasharp can be very memory hungry if not used correctly.
